chapter.title: Getting More Information
chapter.para: For more information on &DSCL; packaging, refer to the resources listed below.

listitem.para: scl --help – General usage information for the scl tool for enabling &DSCL;s and running programs in &DSCL;'s environment.
rpmbuild(8) – The manual page for the rpmbuild utility for building both binary and source packages.
&DSCL;s Packaging Draft (pdf) – The &DSCL;s Packaging Draft can serve as a quick-start guide on packaging &DSCL;s.
